Description: I am trying once again to thin out my herd of stringed instruments. It’s getting harder and harder since I am attached to all of them and have done custom work and mods on just about everything left in my collection. Here is a rare Jay Turser JT-50 (SG copy) with p-90 single coil style pickups. The first thing one notices, besides the P-90’s is the stunning finish. They didn’t make many with this pickup configuration and the asymmetrical body so it’s almost like a custom shop model. This axe was made in the 90’s or early 2000’s at the China factory. All the newer ones were made in Viet Nam, then Korea after the Turser name was sold and they started manufacturing guitars for Best Buy and the like. This guitar is fast, loud and plays like a rocker, it’s solid and built well as all the early Turser’s were, earning them the best value in Guitar Player mag for a few years. I replaced the knobs with silver topped ball knobs (Guitar Fetish $13.95) and a chrome roller bridge (Guitar Fetish $21.95)…that’s all this guitar needed. The P 90's rock and play well clean. This is a beautiful guitar, like new with next to no fret wear and a near perfect body. Included is a gig bag, in which the guitar will be shipped, then boxed wrapped up in bubble wrap.I ship FexEx, I take a bit of a hit on the shipping but I like the tracking and reliability. Check out my other auctions, I will be listing about 20 guitars and basses and microphones in the next few months. I ship fast and currently own a 100% feedback rating as a buyer and seller on EBay (860+ transactions, a member since 2001).
Title: Jay Turser Rare JT-50 P-90 Pickups Jet Black SG style guitar
